page.title: 11Shopping in Camberley
page.content:
Shopping facilities are split between six sites with Camberley Town Centre as the largest. The shopping precinct includes all the Supermarkets and Department Stores, as well as all the {usual multiples.
There are parades of shops at Yorktown, Blackwater, College Town and in the Frimley Road to meet local needs, and a long line of more {specialist shops}along the A30.
These include an{Army Taylor}(The Staff College and the RMA are on the other side of the A30 ), a Lawn Mower shop, a Nut and Bolt shop and many Bric-a-Brac shops. There is also some {Warehousing,}now decaying, left from the time when the A30 was a major route.
